meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> with <radical>talent</radical> can become <kanji>lumber</kanji>. Not all trees can do this. Only the talented ones are able to turn themselves into lumber or <kanji>material</kanji>, to be used for a million different things.
readingMnemonic: Trees can be turned into all kinds of things, but this one wants to use its <kanji>lumber</kanji> and <kanji>material</kanji> to build a <reading>xy</reading>lophone (ざい). It's the most difficult instrument to create, so it suits the talent level of this tree!
